GroupingSpec.description:
A set of directives to control how results are grouped.
The underlying generic groupings are nested to allow for further evolution of the grouping spec.

groupingCriteria.description: A list of generic directives to group results by.

baseEntityType.description:
The type of the entity to be grouped.
e.g. schemaField
Omitting this field will result in all base entities being grouped.

groupingEntityType.description:
The type of the entity to be grouped into.
e.g. dataset, domain, etc.
